page.title: 19 Weston today
page.content: Weston-super-Mare is a seaside resort.It is not as popular today as it was after the war because many people can now go abroad for their holidays. But tourism is still a very important part of Weston. In our class many children's parents are involved in the holiday maker trade. Some own gift shops others run guest houses and a few have restaurants. As well as the interesting places we have been studying in depth there are many other places to visit. A favourite with our class is the Tropicana, which is an outside swimming pool complex.
